text: Juan Camilo Vargas (born 18 April 1994, in Bogota) is a Colombian professional squash player. As of February 2018, he was ranked number 102 in the world. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male squash players Category:Trinity Bantams men's squash players Category:South American Games silver medalists for Colombia Category:South American Games bronze medalists for Colombia Category:South American Games medalists in squash Category:Competitors at the 2018 South American Games Category:Squash players at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in squash Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Colombia Category:Squash players at the 2015 Pan American Games
title: Juan Camilo Vargas
